name.description: The friendly name for the QLDB Ledger instance. By default generated by Terraform.

deletion_protection.description: The deletion protection for the QLDB Ledger instance. By default it is `true`. To delete this resource via Terraform, this value must be configured to `false` and applied first before attempting deletion.

id.description: The Name of the QLDB Ledger

arn.description: The ARN of the QLDB Ledger
